casebody.data:
JONES
v.
DALTON, et al. No. 423P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 11, 2005. W. Gregory Merritt, New Bern, for Gloria Moley, et al. Carl Thurman, III, Andrew R. Kirschner, Atlanta, GA, for Faith Jones.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of August 2005 by Defendants (Gloria Moley, C.R.N.A. and New Hanover Regional Medical Center) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of August 2005."
